modName: Crafting and smithing material add batch
summary: batch that add 5 ingots of the desired material
descriptionHtml:
I was tired of searching ingots ID everytime i needed some and typing the full command in consol everytime i restarted the game so i made this batch.

this batch adds 5 ingots of the desired material using the player.additem command.

the .txt 's name is the 3 first letters of the lingot e.g typing in consol 'bat iro' gives you 5 iron ingots
exceptions: quicksilver= qsil and leather stripes = leas

you can modify the name of all the .txt's if you dont like my shortcuts or to translate in your language so its easier to remember.

you can also modify the number of ingots given if you prefer, just think that ingots are heavy and it's sometimes better to use the uparrow key to repeat last consol commande.

If you download this batch with NMM, please think to avoid the 'dont copy .txt to data folder' option in NMM before you install this
author: shazam
